longBusinessSummary: Elmos Semiconductor SE, together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and distributes microelectronic components and system parts, and technological devices for automotive industry in Germany, other European Union countries, the Americas, Asia/Pacific, and internationally. It offers motor control IC solutions, which includes BLDC motor, controller motor, and DC motor controller ICs; LED driver ICs, such as high voltage, liner LED, and LIN RGB controller ICs; and ultrasonic distance sensor ICs. The company provides optical IR sensor IC, ToF imager, and infrared sensors including pyroelectric sensor signal controller and pyroelectric sensor signal processor. In addition, it offers sensor signal processor and integrated absolute pressure system ICs; and safety, power, and Custom ICs, which includes safety, engine management, and relay driver IC, as well as DC/DC converter, LDO regulator, PSI5, LIN/CAN, and KNX transceivers. Further, the company provides automotive IC solutions including lighting, LiDAR, ultrasonic ranging, object and gesture recognition, thermal management, electronic fuse control, and SSPs. It serves automotive and non-automotive applications comprising smart home and industrial automation applications. Elmos Semiconductor SE was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Dortmund, Germany.
